title: Sales & Business Development Specialist (Logistics) #65274
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Description
Industry/ Organization Type: Logistics/ Freight Forwarding
Position Title: Sales & Business Development Specialist
Working Location: Changi
Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 8.30 am – 6.18 pm
Salary Package: Basic Salary + AWS + Variable Bonus
Duration: Permanent
Key Responsibilities
To hunt for sales and new target accounts for specific trade lanes assigned.
To obtain and handle all detailed RFQs and shipments.
To develop and grow existing accounts.
To source new business through cold calls and telemarketing.
To present professional sales service to all customers.
Preparation and submission of monthly sales reports to HOD and Management.
Any ad-hoc tasks as assigned.
APPLY NOW!!!
Minimum Diploma Holder.
Preferably Min 1-year experience in Sales and Business Development in Logistics.
Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
Good sales presentation and negotiation skills.
Good team player and strong interpersonal skills.
Must be driven to achieve given targets.
Kindly apply through ANY of the following methods:
Submit your application by clicking the APPLY button;
Email your resume to Job(at)anradus.com.sg. Please indicate #65274 on the email subject.
Anradus Application Policy: We value each application and ensure every resume is reviewed. Our process is efficient, typically concluding within 3 working days. If you do not receive communication from us within this timeframe, it's likely that your application has not been shortlisted by our client. In such cases, we recommend continuing your job search to maximize your opportunities.
Anradus Pte Ltd | EA License No. 20C0161 | Adelin Chong | EA Reg No.: R1875641

title: Business Development Executive (Training Provided)
company_info: EPS CONSULTANTS PTE LTD We are a leading recruitment agency with over a decade of experience in this industry, our clients trust in getting the job done, the right way. We are a trusted HR partner for local and global companies. Our comprehensive staffing solutions include candidate contingency and executive search, contract staffing, manpower outsourcing and recruitment process outsourcing (RPO).
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Working days & hours: 5 days, 8:30am-6pm
Working location: Ubi Avenue 4

Job Description
The Business Development Executive will have responsibility for driving market share and qualifying leads.
The Business Development Executive will follow up on web inquiries, pre‐qualify leads, and develop to the point of Sales closure.
In addition to inbound inquiries, the Business Development Specialist will perform prospecting, marketing event outreach and sales development functions to build a pipeline within targeted accounts designated by management.
An implicit responsibility of the Business Development Executive is to conduct business dealings with prospects in a way that creates a superior customer/prospect experience to set the stage for future sales.
Job Requirements
Degree in any discipline.
At least 3-5 years of relevant working experience in B2B sales and business development hunter role for professional services preferred.
Candidates with complex sales, Business Process Outsourcing or Call Centre services sales experienced preferred.
Be familiar with GeBiz and large-scale tendering processes.
Working/partnering with Digital and Technology vendors and sub-contractors to translate business requirements to tender solutions.
HOW TO APPLY:
Interested applicants, please submit your updated resume in PDF/MS Word format to brandon@eps.com.sg
Please state your availability, current & expected salaries for processing purpose.
All applications will be treated in the strictest confidence.
We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
Brandon Lim | EA Registration No: R21102894

title: Business Development Specialist
company_info: HORIBA Instruments (Singapore) Pte Ltd is the ASEAN Headquarter of HORIBA Ltd., Japan, a global leader in advanced analytical and measurement technology. Instruments and systems made by the HORIBA GROUP set high quality and performance standards across a wide range of fields. At HORIBA, we believe dreams and hopes together with the marvels of technology create the future. We invite you to explore the future with us.
job_category: Engineering, Marketing / Public Relations, Wholesale Trade
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Description:
We are seeking energetic and driven candidates to fill our openings for Business Development Specialist, based in Singapore. You will be responsible for the sales, marketing, and business development of our wide array of process and environmental products.

Responsibilities:
- Research new market opportunities and responsible for driving business growth within a company.
- Develop new sales strategies and action plans to expand overall business growth
- Oversee existing customers and develop new customers within assigned industrial market sector.
- Daily tasks include handling of sales enquiries, preparation of sales quotation and costing sheet, conducting customer visits if necessary.
- Perform product sales introduction and technical presentations to customers.
- Assist to manage existing network of distributors within South East Asia and give directions in line with markets trends
- Opportunity to expand and appoint/develop new distributors in new territories.
- Support distributors to achieve their respective Sales targets, and hence achieve the overall target for the region.
- Work together with the respective distributors to create appropriate strategies for each market and/or market segments.
- Closely monitor distributor sales performance on a quarterly basis and feedback to respective distributors as well.
- Represent the Company in a professional manner and establishing good rapport and business relationship with our customers, suppliers and principals.

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s Degree in any discipline.
- At least 3 years of working experience in water quality analytical instruments, experience/exposure to process & environmental monitoring equipment.
- At least 5 years of experience in sale and marketing management
- Willing to travel up to 30% in a year
- Excellent interpersonal and communication skills

title: Business Development Specialist
company_info: AIMS (Asia Innovatory Management School) is an industry expert in Recruitment, Management as well as ICT Services. AIMs has been in this industry for the past 12 years since 2008. Over a decade, our depth of expertise and local knowledge enables us to transform your Human Capital to meet the challenges of the future. We provide proven industry-leading strategic, and cost-effective solutions. This would meet your business needs as well as enhance your HR practices. Enhancing them in recruiting, managing, and developing talents.
job_category: Customer Service, Healthcare / Pharmaceutical, Hospitality, Sales / Retail, Others
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
About MyQueen:
My Queen is the 1st prenatal and postpartum wellness centre located in Sentosa, supported by a medical team. We aspire to provide prenatal and postpartum care for our quintessential women, to empower and support modern women in their maternal journey.
We strive to educate our mummies on topics varying from breast care to infant care. Marrying modern knowledge and traditional cultural insights by maternal-infant experts, we would like to deliver a blended maternal care model that emphasizes parental bonding and positive emotional wellbeing. We believe in a Happy Mum, a Happy Baby.
To learn more, please watch a short video about what we do here or visit our website here.
We are looking for an experienced Business Development Specialist who is passionate and capable of driving market development for our startup. This role will be focused on increasing the reach of prenatal and postpartum services to all the quintessential women; and requires the industry background, strategic thinking, and communication skills to establish our company as the leader in this maternal and child market. In this role, you will address rapidly changing customer needs, drive the right service solutions, and enable the ecosystem of partners and customers smoothly. The candidate should be proficient in English and Chinese to manage our company’s customers.Being a key part of the team focusing on prenatal and postpartum services
Be a key part of the team focusing on prenatal and postpartum services
Development of go-to-market strategies in Singapore and subsequently regionally - APAC
Engaging with customers, strategic partners in the maternal and child ecosystem
Work closely with marketing team to design marketing campaigns that address the pain points of customers
Work closely with our partners to develop and curate attractive services desired by our customers
Actively working to increase customer size
Actively working to build a robust ecosystem that involves varied stakeholders, not limiting to customers, partners, and advisors.
A Successful Candidate should have:
Minimum 1 year of business development experience in or selling to the maternal and child healthcare industry
Significant leadership experience working with partners, with demonstrated experience interacting at the management level
Good knowledge and understanding of the prenatal and postpartum industry
Demonstrated ability to think strategically and analytically about business, service, with the ability to build and convey compelling value propositions, and work cross organizationally to build consensus.
Strong leadership skills are key, with proven verbal and written communications skills with demonstrated ability to work effectively across internal and external organizations.
Bachelor’s degree in technology or equivalent industry experience

title: Business Development Specialist
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Roles & Responsibilities
Drive various prospecting activities via different methodologies for the purpose of networking and generating leads that are important for the business.
Delivering sales speeches in a systematic, professional manner in person, over the phone, and in emails.
Review sales performance with the goal of exceeding or meeting goals.
Bringing in sales and negotiating the details of a deal.
Calculating costs quickly and accurately and providing them with quotes.
What we offer:
One of the best commission schemes in the market.
Excellent Career Progression opportunities.
Remote & flexible work schedule where we adopt a task & result-oriented approach.
Training will be provided.
Requirements:
0-3 years of work experience in B2B Sales/HR Consulting/Edu-consulting.
Candidates with no prior experience but with a keen interest in building a strong network, are welcome to apply.
Proactive attitude & ability to work independently.
Accept constructive feedback and look to grow together with the company.
Interested candidates may send their latest resume (with a photo attached) apply via this job advertisement.

We regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

title: Business Development Specialist
company: ACP COMPUTER TRAINING SCHOOL PTE. LTD.
company_info: For more than 26 years, ACP has been a pioneering force in Information & Communication Technology (ICT) solutions in Singapore. Since our inception in 1997, we have consistently driven innovation and progress, cementing our position as a trusted and prominent entity in Singapore's technological landscape. We stand as a crucial partner to major Government Ministries, Statutory Boards, and esteemed corporate entities, reflecting our status as a certified ISO 9001:2015 QMS, Data Protection Trustmark, Bizsafe Level 3 organization, and recipient of the Total Defense Award. Our impact extends beyond Singapore's borders, as we have expanded our influence across international lines. We proudly hold the Exclusive Distributor title for renowned industry giants such as Articulate, Vyond, Jetbrains, and Inmagine in the Philippines, Thailand, Indo-China region, and Indonesia. This exclusivity underscores our commitment to providing cutting-edge solutions to diverse markets, enabling digital transformation beyond Singapore's shores. Fueled by a dedicated team of over 60 skilled professionals, we are the driving force behind the success stories of our impressive clientele. Our distinguished list of clients includes prominent names like the Ministry of Education, Singapore (MOE), the Infocomm-media Development Authority, Singapore (iMDA), GovTech, GIC, the Institute of Technical Education, Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD), the Ministry of Home Affairs, the Ministry of Defense, the National Library Board, SMRT, Lazada, Carousell, and many others. At ACP, our 26-year legacy stands as a testament to our unwavering dedication and expertise. As we continue to evolve and innovate, our commitment to transforming industries remains steadfast. Beyond being just a technology provider, we are a progressive partner, poised to shape the future of technology in Singapore and beyond.

title: Business Development Specialist - Accounting Solutions -
company_info: Headquartered in the Netherlands, Randstad is a Fortune Global 500 Company and the second largest recruitment & HR services provider globally. Operating in over 40 countries, Randstad employs over 567,700 people in meaningful employment everyday. With global reach and local expertise, Randstad Singapore has over 20 years experience in the Singapore market and are dedicated to delivering high quality, consistent service to our clients and candidates. Our passionate, consultants will provide you with career advice and opportunities that meet your career goals and aspirations. With the widest range of industry specialists across: Accounting Banking & Financial Services Business Support Engineering Information Technology Life Sciences Supply Chain & Procurement Sales, Marketing & Communications Let us help you shape your work of work. Search for your next career opportunity at www.randstad.com.sg/jobs or contact us on +65 6510 1350.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
About the client
I am representing one of the leading consulting firms in Singapore that offers a full range of business solutions ranging from IT , Payroll, Auditing with more than 500 employees across the region.

As part of its business growth in their IT service provider business , they are looking for a driven and independent Sales Executive to join their team to generate new business by actively hunting and prospecting new clients while maintaining relationships with existing clients for cross-sell and up-selling opportunities.

About the role
Reporting to the Sales Director , your responsibilities would includes
Work closely with senior management to understand & execute sales strategies to achieve company”s business goals
You would be proactive in prospecting new & existing clients through a variety of sales methods- such as cold calling, email prospecting and being able to provide a consultative sales approach and customizing company”s solutions to their needs
You should be proactive in understanding company”s products and services , market trends and competitive landscape to serve as a subject matter expert to clients and prospects
Building and maintaining a strong pipelines of leads and be consistent in updating progress and status in CRM system
This would enable you to provide accurate and timely forecasts for monthly, quarterly and annual performance, including risk and opportunity analysis
Skills and experience required
Relevant experience in B2B sales with a business solutions provider or accounting solutions
Strong presentation skills with the ability to speak to people of all levels
Able to work independently and collaborate well with others in view of overall objectives
If you are interested in the position, please click “apply” David Lerh (EA:94C3609/ R1769977)
